channel.title: Help with d claws spec(317)
channel.description: Using a delta source, when you use d claw spec, the green spec bar goes down 2/3 the way. But it has 2 specs so it should be going down half way. Can somone show me how to edit this little problem?

item.title: Help with d claws spec(317)
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 25; specialAmount -= 25; }

I don’t know try that it works fine on my server maybe it’s just your client?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with d claws spec(317)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 50;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with d claws spec(317)
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Show me the code of your Dclaws special.
